explanation: [0-0] A man in a blue hoodie stands by a kitchen table, holding a long black sword in both hands. There is a red apple on the table. Behind the man in blue are a white refrigerator, white cabinets, and kitchenware.

[0-6] The man in blue pulls the sword out with his right hand and then quickly retracts it, splitting the red apple on the table in half. The scene then cuts to a man in white clothes squatting behind the table, with a man dressed as Spiderman standing to the side. There are two apples on the table, and the man in white is holding a long sword. The man in white then draws the sword with his right hand and quickly retracts it, splitting the apple on the left side of the table in half. Spiderman stretches out his hands, then puts both hands on his head, showing great surprise.
